chapters.title: Chapter 3: Pale Shadows
chapters.info: Joinde, p. 108 (78)—Maiden who once stood guard at Rand's door. She just gave up the spear to marry Garan of the Jhirad sept of the Goshien Aiel. He was her gai'shain for a year beforehand. She is of the Black Rock sept of the Shaarad Aiel; the Shaarad and the Goshien were blood enemies at the time they married. See also Garan.
